info.name: DeviantArt CORE No More
info.description:
A simple style that removes all the Core Membership visuals.

Core logos are changed back into stars, white backgrounds are removed, their colour is returned to the neutral text-colour.

There is also an option to remove the 'become Core' ad from the top of the page for those who aren't premium members.

data.title: New CORE campaign not covered in this ad
